I have been holding off on writing a review, given that this game has been a rollercoaster over the years, with good updates being followed by bad updates, and vice versa. The bad has for the most part not been game-breaking, just undesireable. However, given the last few updates (looking at you 4.5.0), the time has come to take part in the show of disapproval toward the developers.

It is clear that the developers have their full focus on extracting every penny they can from overly loyal fans and oblivious newcomers. They show very little regard for player feedback, rolling out updates with game-breaking bugs that only a week ago required a handful of maps to be temporarily disabled. Without having fixed the many still present bugs, they choose to add features that worsen some of the existing problems or alienate their playerbase.

If it isn't obvious by now, my current thoughts are that if you haven't picked up this game yet, [b]DO NOT[/b]! Wait until Behaviour gets their act together and fix their game. There's still a (slim) chance the game can return to an enjoyable state.
And finally, while I don't expect the already invested to read reviews, I shall still share the advice many content creators have uttered: Stop trading with Auric Cells. Do not purchase anything with them, and for heaven's sake do not purchase the ACs themselves. The cash flow and interest for "premium" items need to be halted in order for the developers to take the hint and start respecting their demographic.

Ce jeu est vraiment top. Un ami me l'avait fait découvrir. A la base, je n'étais pas jeux en réseau mais avec Dead by Daylight j'ai pris goût à jouer en réseau avec des amis. Pour tous ceux qui aiment les jeux d'horreur et qui aiment se faire peur, ce jeu est fait pour vous. Très belles améliorations graphiques dernièrement. Au choix d'être survivant ou tueur avec chacun leurs compétences spécifiques. Je recommande vraiment.

ЭТО ЛУЧШАЯ ПОМОЙКА В МИРЕ

这游戏最傻逼的是段位匹配机制，就想不通制作组为什么要让一个刚玩到绿段紫段的小屠夫接受红段装甲车队的毒打？
在者垃圾技能一大堆，刚玩什么也不懂，点了一堆垃圾技能，真的醉了。
还有就是段位一高对于不是那么厉害的屠夫玩家来说也就幻神能打打了。
哦对了，人类段位到红段双排都得十分钟以上，这还是两个靠混上去的菜鸡排的速度，四个人的话排的更慢。
总之，从高中开始听说这款游戏到现在大学打的将近三百小时，体验真的没有我想象的那么好。
Sehr gutes Spiel. MAn muss sich zwar erst dran gewöhnen, aber eines meiner Favoriten.

Если спросить профессионального шахматиста, как он может играть тысячи партий на одной и той же карте, с одними и теми же фигурами и необновляющимися возможностями и при этом не заскучать, он, наверное, усмехнется, попросит вас подрасти и немного глубже ознакомиться с содержанием и ценностью этой игры.

Конечно, содержательно Dead By Daylight не имеет с шахматами ничего общего. Тем не менее их роднит очень многое: обе спортивные дисциплины предлагают здоровую пищу для ума, требуют от игрока опыта, серьезнейшего тактического анализа и способности на много ходов вперед предсказывать развитие событий.

Этот тупой кусок говна я бы не стал качать ни за что в жизни даже за бесплатно, если бы мои друзья в него не задротили. Игра в плане механик и анимаций пососнее даже чем Paladins. Уёбищные хитбоксы, палеты иногда просто не дропаются, брэйндэд маны по типу Ханты и Фредди, против которых просто не имеет смысла играть, ибо как если они играют чуть лучше картошки - шансы на выживание минимальны. Просто идите нахуй.
топ игра 🕹

Well I'm out. I've been playing this game since the day it came out and I've been nothing more than loyal and supportive when it came to Dead by Daylight. Now I'm officially done. Patch 4.5.0 was the first nail in the coffin, or so I thought. With that update I started to realize how little effort Behaviour Interactive really puts into their game. They got no idea about what their player base think and want. They need a serious reality check and need to start listening to their loyal players. A lot of people spend thousands and thousands of hours on this game and they never get heard. The game is buggy, glitchy, unbalanced and need a bigger effort than Behaviour will ever dare to put into it. I'm dissapointed and sad that a game I've supported 200% since day one have pissed me up and down my back in all that time. To top it all off with the most horrific chapter (chapter 19) I've ever seen in DBD history. To add a K-Pop star with a few knives into the game is the worst idea I've ever seen considering it's a "supposed to be horror-game"... You keep yourself in the foot Behaviour and I hope with all the energy in my body that your player base will turn their back on you, because that is what you really deserve...
